attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to bring back Corporal punishment in the light of the Rhys Jones murder!
There is a need to rethink the poilicies on soft sentences.  Give back perental rights to discipline their children. Schools should have the power to punish those that need punishing.
Enforce proper policing of all areas in the country.
This will enable decent people to go out with their families without fear and intimidation from young criminals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
